comment.author: 11334970@N05
comment._content: kjlast, thanks for your interest. There is a zoom function on the NMM website, which you can use to see the details.

comment.author: 30423736@N06
comment._content:
This photograph shows Worthing, its beach littered with wood, following the sinking of a cargo ship in January 2008. The coastline has changed significantly but the building on the right remains.

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/nimmykins/2211469061/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 87914514@N00
comment._content: Hi, this photo is being discussed in one of the projects in the Flickr Commons group, and we'd love to have this added to the group pool!
